    • Cutlery
    • 6-Piece Knife Set

    6-Piece Knife Set
    Read Review (21) |   Write a review

     
     

    Our 6-Piece Knife Set has the color you love—with all the high-quality knives you need most! Stainless steel blades are precision ground for superior sharpness.

      Knife set includes:
    • 3 1/4" paring knife
    • 4 3/4" utility knife
    • 8" carving knife
    • 8" chef's knife
    • 8" serrated bread knife
    Hand wash. Wood block is 6 3/4" l x 6" w x 7 1/4" h.

    Sign in to your Address Book.
